title: Enchanted Blossom Jhumkas - A Symphony of Diamonds and Gemstones
materials: Crafted from 34.740 grams of exquisite Fine Gold (FG)
these jhumkas showcase a dazzling array of 3.77 carats of brilliant-cut diamonds (498 stones). Accentuated with marquise-cut sapphires
pink tourmalines and citrine adding a spectrum of color. Features intricate diamond settings to ensure maximum brilliance.
features: These modern jhumkas feature a unique floral-inspired design, where diamond-studded flowers blossom alongside a delicate vine adorned with colorful gemstones. Each gemstone is meticulously set to capture and reflect light, creating a mesmerizing sparkle. The contemporary design blends seamlessly with traditional Jhumka sensibilities.
colors: The color palette is a harmonious blend of the pristine white of the diamonds
blush pinks of the tourmalines and the sun-kissed yellows of the citrine
set against the radiant backdrop of fine gold.
occasions: a special occasion like a reception
or to add a touch of elegance to any ensemble. These Jhumkas will certainly elevate your style quotient.
description: Experience the allure of contemporary design fused with the timeless charm of gemstones and diamonds. These Jhumkas offer a unique blend of tradition and modernity, making them a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality diamonds and intricate craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value.
